entry.title: Slack sponsor workshop
entry.summary:
Description

New features and powerful tools make it easier and more intuitive to build custom Slack apps in Python.

Slides: https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fi/29ok1tj5h5v4naxd3v1tv/PyCon-21_-Building-on-Slack-Platform.pptx?dl=0&rlkey=3mdypwn3hdq23o04557ut3h80
